snippet: The Metropolitan Museum of Art held a formal ground-breaking on Monday morning for the $65 million makeover of its plaza and fountains, a project that has been under construction since October.
abstract: The Metropolitan Museum of Art held a formal ground-breaking on Monday morning for the $65 million makeover of its plaza and fountains, a project that has been under construction since October.

headline.main: Ground Is Officially Broken on Met Museum's 'David H. Koch Plaza'
headline.print_headline: Ground Is Broken For New Met Plaza
